short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: auto fill resumes and apply to jobs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension automates the job application process by auto-filling application forms directly on career pages using stored user profiles. Users can view multiple job profiles and track submitted applications. This tool aims to reduce the time and effort spent on manual data entry, increase application accuracy, and enhance job application management.
